easyStandard.skull: –1 (–3 instead if there is an _Ancient One_ enemy at your location).
easyStandard.cultist: –1. If there is a seal at your location, or if your location is a Mist-Pylon, treat this token as a {frost} token, instead.
easyStandard.tablet: –3. If you fail, draw the top card of the Tekeli-li deck.
easyStandard.elderthing: –4. If you fail by 3 or more, place 1 doom on the current agenda. This can cause the current agenda to advance.

hardExpert.skull: –2 (–4 instead if there is an _Ancient One_ enemy at your location).
hardExpert.cultist: –1. If there is a seal at your location, or if your location is a Mist-Pylon, treat this token as a {frost} token in addition to its modifier.
hardExpert.tablet: –3. Draw the top card of the Tekeli-li deck.
hardExpert.elderthing: –5. If you fail by 3 or more, place 1 doom on the current agenda. This can cause the current agenda to advance.
